column1: prompt
What is the economic purpose of setting minimum wages?
Suggest two activities for teaching children about renewable energy.
Name three companies that produce electric cars.
Rewrite the following headline by replacing the words in bold with a synonym. Harvard Researchers Create a Plant-Based Alternative to Leather

Classify the following article whether it is related to sports or business. The New York Yankees announced today that they are proud to expand their existing partnership with Logitech to now include the company's audio product line.
Why is physical exercise important for maintaining mental health?
Describe what Tesla Autopilot is.
Classify the following into low, medium and high stress levels. Having a performance review.

Select the countries mentioned in the article. More than two dozen countries in Eastern Europe, the former Soviet Union, East Asia and the Middle East are hurriedly purchasing American-made defense equipment.
Select the effect of the new technology mentioned in the article. In a game-changing development, researchers have developed new technology to accurately monitor pollutants in the atmosphere.
Name the types of pollutants mentioned in the article. The new technology is able to measure a range of pollutants, including carbon dioxide, methane, sulfur dioxide, and nitrogen oxide.
Ask a question that someone buying the product might have. Smart Fridge Pro, a Wi-Fi enabled fridge that connects to the internet and can provide recipes and detailed nutrition advice.
Generate a list of 5-10 tasks the assistant can complete.
Name 5 skills that the assistant will need to complete the tasks.
Build a database table with the given columns. Name, Age, Gender
Analyze the given problem and list potential solutions. Increase company productivity
Give 5 tips for eating healthy.
Categorize the given items as either liquid or solid. Apple juice, chalk
Paraphrase the sentence such that it retains the same meaning. The server crashed and caused data losses.

Categorize a job application into one of the following five categories:
Accounting, Programming, Sales and marketing, Design, and Art. I recently applied for a position as a software engineer.
Generate a list of ingredients and instructions to make a dish. Apple Pie
Find the ratio of the surface area of a circle with radius 4 cm to a square with side 4 cm
Create a table showing the population of each continent
Write the conjugation of the verb “have” in past perfect tense.
Decide if the following sentence is a cause and effect sentence. The virus has caused an increase in deaths.
Join two sentences to make one. John was reading a book. The book was interesting.
Rearrange the sequence of the words below to make a proper sentence. a clearly difficult the was situation
Given two pieces of information, find the correlation between them. Height and number of shoes owned
Generate a story with a specific context. Once upon a time, there was a lion who lived in a snowy forest.
Compose a story that communicates a moral. There was once a fox who wanted to be the fastest animal in the forest
Produce a poem that talks about a natural scene. Spring
Generate a sentence that emphasizes an emotion. Joy
Given a sentence, make it more concise while keeping its meaning intact. The house was situated in an area where it was surrounded by trees on all sides.
Modify the provided sentence to describe how you feel right now I'm feeling relaxed.
Describe the sounds at a zoo
Invent a new toy based on a given description A toy that fits in the palm of your hand and teaches children about the constellations.
Sort the given words from most to least serious Sneeze, trip, shout
I am having a hard time focusing on my work today. What can I do to help?
Write a functional Javascript code to print the string "Hello World" to the console.
Put together a list of 10 safety tips for taking a long drive.
Find a movie for me on Netflix that has a rating of 8.0 or higher.
Download an excel sheet and find the greatest 5 values in it <excel file>
Find the width of a square, given the length of a side is 15 meters.
Provide an example of a species of bird that is locally endangered.
Categorize the following set of items as vegetables, fruits or neither. Blueberries, potatoes, fish
Describe two ways that humans can reduce air pollution.
Explain the process of water purification.
Create an analogy between coding and baking.
What factors do businesses need to consider when determining their pricing models?
Write a product description for this phone case. This phone case is made out of durable yet lightweight plastic, and it is designed to protect against everyday wear and tear.
Pick a topic and generate a creative writing piece. Topic: Beach
Find and provide two sources to support the following statement The economic cost of climate change is estimated in trillions of dollars.
Generate a script for a romantic comedy that includes two main characters.
Generate a joke using machine learning
Write an emergency response plan

Edit this article to make the writing more concise This mountain range is located in Northern Japan and it has been declared a national park, and it is a tourist destination famous for being a nature reserve and it also holds tremendous cultural significance.

Generate a unique email subject for the following message. Dear [Name], 

This is a reminder that our Customer Advisory meeting is tomorrow at 9am. 

Please prepare any questions you have for the meeting in advance.

Thank you,
[Your Name]

From the text below, create a unique opening phrase for a story about a young girl who lives in a world where electricity is scarce The young girl was born into a world of clashing technology and scarcity. She had been raised to understand the consequences of the world around her, yet she still dreamt of a place where electricity was abundant.
Given the following statement, select the best-suited reaction The team was disqualified from the competition
For the following statement, provide a single word response I am looking forward to the weekend
Brainstorm ideas for a unique outdoor activity that isn’t too difficult to organize.
Describe the habitat of the Sumatran tiger.
List three types of animals that live in the Arctic tundra.
Write a persuasive essay arguing against the use of cell phones in school.
Analyze the economic implications of a national minimum wage.
Compare and contrast two methods of teaching using technology.
Generate a title for an essay on immigration reform.
Explain why fossil fuels are non-renewable resources.
Hypothesize about what could happen next in the following scenario. The little boy was playing in the park when he saw a strange looking animal.
Describe what the boy must be feeling in the following scenario. The little boy walked out of school, alone.
Construct a realistic research question about social media usage.
Provide a realistic context for the following sentence. She was frustrated and angry.
What is the purpose of Point of Sale (POS) systems?
Create a metaphor for "mountain of tasks"
What is a quadratic equation
Rank the following basketball players according to their points scored Michael Jordan, LeBron James, Kobe Bryant
Convert 90 km/h to miles/hr
What do you need to open an online business?
Write a five sentence paragraph about the difference between a star and a planet.
Explain why the US Constitution is considered a living document.
Describe a setting using similes and metaphors.
Name a game that two kids can play indoors during the summer.
What is the main difference between acute and chronic diseases?
Explain the usage of the keyword "public" in Java.
Compare the cost of a flight from Los Angeles to London in July with the cost of one in August.
Convert a phrase into a question. She is learning about the rainforest.
Describe the form of expression used in the given sentence. This news means a lot to me.
Write a CSS class to make all h2 headings orange.

Find the most important phrase in this text. Four hundred and thirty-one members of the United Nations have signed a resolution condemning the actions of the Peoples’ Republic of China in the South China Sea.

Analyze this haiku and explain its meaning. Whitecaps on the bay
